member.name: M:Crestron.RAD.SystemManager.RadSystemManager.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the RAD System Manager. Will load the driver manifest file if it exists. If it does not exist one will be created.

member.name: M:Crestron.RAD.SystemManager.RadSystemManager.ReloadManifest
member.summary: Reloads the manifest file and updates any changed device modules

member.name: P:Crestron.RAD.SystemManager.RadSystemManager.ManifestFilename
member.summary: Retrieves the full file path to the manifest file along with the manifest file filename (\\User\\RAD\\DriverTcp.dll)

member.name: M:Crestron.RAD.SystemManager.RadSystemManager.GenerateDriverManifest
member.summary: Generates the driver manifest file string

member.name: M:Crestron.RAD.SystemManager.RadSystemManager.ReadDriverManifestFile
member.summary: Retrieves the driver manifest file and reads it
member.returns: False if there was an error reading the file

member.name: M:Crestron.RAD.SystemManager.RadSystemManager.WriteDriverManifestFile
member.summary: Writes the driver manifest to a file

member.name: M:Crestron.RAD.SystemManager.RadSystemManager.GenerateResources
member.summary: Attempts to generate any missing files or directories

member.name: M:Crestron.RAD.SystemManager.RadSystemManager.GenerateErrorLogNotice(System.String)
member.summary: Helper method to print log messages (Notice)

member.name: M:Crestron.RAD.SystemManager.SMWrapper.AssignTransportType(System.String)
member.summary: Assign priority type based on string from module
